MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL46 postcode area of Harlech affecting properties in Old Llanfair Road and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:30am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:11am on the 10th February 2021.
